name: Limbo Party
description:
Trapped in limbo is a main character that does NOT want to be there! With three possible endings and multiple spirits to try and save, this is one adventure that...again. She does not want to be a part of!

*While this game is unfortunately in the beta stage, we are currently aware of a bug that prevents you from viewing the endings, we apologize for the inconvenience and it will be fixed in a future update. Until then, please enjoy what the game still DOES have to offer!!

-8 spirits for you to try to save

-Some characters that are linked together, who has the full story?

-A sassy main character

-A secret backstory slowly unlocked

-Completely custom art, music, and story!

Future updates:

-Will fix the bug preventing the multiple endings from being viewed

-Will replace the default face graphics that were placed as placeholders

-More bug fixes
